formatting_hint:
Use Markdown for formatting. For example:

# Level 1 heading 
### Level 3 heading
###### Level 6 heading

Paragraphs
Add two new lines to start new paragraph.

Bold
**bold**

Italic
*italic*

Lists
* bullet list item
- another bullet list item
+ bullet markers may differ

1. Numbered list item
2. Second numbered list item
9. Item #3, elements are numbered by natural order
number value doesn't matter

Links
[example](http://example.com)

Images
![Alt-text](http://example.com/)
